Trade/Device Name(s): ImmunoCAP Thyroglobulin IgG Antibodies Controls NLH
ImmunoCAP Thyroid Peroxidase IgG Antibodies Controls NLH
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ImmunoCAP Thyroglobulin and ImmunoCAP Thyroid Peroxidase assays and controls for detection and monitoring of IgG antibodies using ImmunoCAP platforms.
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro quantitative measurement of IgG antibodies specific for Thyroglobulin and Thyroid Peroxidase in human serum and plasma, as an aid in the diagnosis of certain thyroid diseases such as autoimmune thyroiditis and Graves' disease, for use in clinical and physician office laboratories.
